attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are attempting to alleviate shoddy breeding policies by UK Breed Clubs especially within the Bichons Frise breeds.

It is known a fact that dogs are suffering due to premature blindness because breeders are failing to eye test their animals, then breeding irresponsibly in order to sell dogs.
This is an ongoing concern in UK lines.

Those that do not comply to testing should not be granted a licnence to breed dogs from their local councils.

All breeders should be licensed to protect dogs from abuse in the future.

rejection.details: Sorry, you didn't create a clear call-to-action for your petition
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
